DOC.brief_summary: The study design describe relationship dose pharmacokinetic parameter paroxetine range propose dosage strength paroxetine CR tablet ( 12.5 37.5 mg ) well safety profile
DOC.brief_title: Single Dose Pharmacokinetic ( PK ) Study Of Paroxetine CR ( 12.5-37.5mg ) In Healthy Chinese Subjects
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : 1945 year healthy Chinese Body weight > 50 kg BMI 1925 serological negative HIV , syphilis hepatitis B C abnormalities ECG Female negative pregnancy male plan child 3 month study . Exclusion criterion : History chronic physical/mental disease , current disease concomitant medication
